title: Capstone team making
content: Seniors, how was it while u guys were making teams for ur capstone? I can see my friendships getting affected, falling apart and many more, how did u guys deal with it?

comments.body: lol ur friendships are weak af , im sorry but they r not ur friends

I formed a team with my friends. We didnâ€™t get along as a team but our friendship survived at the end of it. Most of the tension was due to our mentor. Just get through with it. Be kind and patient

Prioritise common research goals/interests while choosing teammates and it will work out far better. Don't choose friends as capstone teammates unless they share the same goals. At the end of the day, you want not only yourself to do well but also your friends to do well in capstone. If it requires you to work in different teams, its something you will have to do.
